heroBlock.head: A European company with high-quality solutions
heroBlock.description: NJORDMARINE cares about its customers and values their time, that is why we provide the necessary equipment, original and OEM spare parts, as well as service in the shortest possible time and at a reasonable price.

servicesBlock.heading: Our services
servicesBlock.tagline1: We care about our customers and

advantagesBlock.heading: Our competitive advantages
advantagesBlock.tagline: What can you expect from us

geoBlock.heading: Coverage map
geoBlock.text: We provide vessel services everywhere, ensuring that our team of experienced professionals are always ready to provide expert assistance to your vessel, no matter where in the world it is located.
geoBlock.text2: We are always ready to help you!

heroAboutBlock.text: NJORDMARINE is a family business based on trust and willingness to help in difficult times. Our team of specialists is ready to fulfil customer requests with any degree of complexity. Our competitive advantage is the timely execution of orders thanks to long-term cooperation with reliable suppliers and courier services.

abotFactBlock.tagline: 3 facts about our company that will interest you

list.text2: We provide assistance in improving the technical processes on board
list.text3: We take on tasks of any complexity

ourTeamBlock.text: Our team of experienced professionals is always ready to provide qualified assistance.

auto.title: Vessel automation services
auto.text: is to assist our customers in the automation of critical processes from the point of view of operational safety, as well as the most time-consuming and regularly repeated operations.
auto.workTitle: We perform the following types of automation works

meintenance.title: Technical meintenance
meintenance.text1: We provide ultrasonic thickness measurements services for all types of vessels and have relevant certificates from classification societies including BV, DNV, ABS, RINA and RMRS).
meintenance.text2: Measurements at height are performed by our technical climbers, who are certified by the DNV and ABS classification societies to carry out the relevant work.
meintenance.measurTagline: Thickness measurement services include the following steps

onBoard.title: On-board solution
onBoard.head: Your first step towards the reduction of fuel consumption and improvement of vessel performance
onBoard.text: Our system integrates perfectly with other on-board systems ensuring the display of all necessary parameters.
onBoard.optionsTitle: Parameters controlled by the on-board system

contacts.text: Fill out the form and our team will contact you shortly.

advantages.text1: We offer our service 24/7, seven days a week
advantages.text2: The best prices and high quality of spare parts, equipment and work
advantages.text3: High delivery speed with minimal logistics costs
advantages.text4: We constantly monitor the time of spare parts readiness and delivery of pending orders.
advantages.text5: Minimum six months warranty on all parts and labor
advantages.text6: Advanced technology solutions for efficient fleet management

works.text1: Automation of starting, stopping, and monitoring processes of main engines, diesel generators, boilers, pumps, and other equipment
works.text2: Fuel consumption metering system and control of the condition of vessel mechanisms
works.text5: Automatic control over the operation of mechanisms and maintenance of operational documentation
works.text7: Measurements of levels in tanks with the output of information on the vessel’s control panels

measurements.text1: Preliminary inspection of the place of measurement of residual thickness and coordination of the scope of work
measurements.text2: Coordination of survey programs with the inspector of the classification society
measurements.text3: Measurement of the thickness of steel structures of vessels and land terminals
measurements.text4: Execution of reports on the work performed in accordance with the rules of classification societies
measurements.text5: Execution of repair drawings with the use of detailed weight tables

consumers.title: The main consumers
consumers.text1: Fuel consumption of the main engine, auxiliary engine, boilers (consumption - hourly, total, over a specific period of time)
consumers.text3: RPM and load of Main and Diesel generators
consumers.text6: Generation of reports (daily, weekly, monthly and navigation)

control.title: Control of bunkering operations
control.text2: Weight, density and temperature of fuel during bunkering operations

option.title: Vessel parameters
option.text3: Control of the condition of vessel consumers

focus.title: FOCUS Fleet Management System
focus.text: is a fuel metering and energy efficiency monitoring and management system for vessels fleet
focus.head: The principle of the Focus management system
focus.text2: Clear interaction between the fleet and the office will help to build all processes at a high level and reduce further costs.
focus.titleBottom: The FOCUS system has been developed to perform all these processes as a single product

config.text1: Collect data from across the fleet
config.text4: Provide of recommendations for improving vessel energy efficiency

options.text1: Reduced execution time of all statistics processes
options.text4: Data storage on a customer сomfortable platform
options.text5: Recommendations issued by the system to reduce costs

office.title: Office solution
office.text2: solution you can easily control all of the vessel’s operating parameters with the possibility of subsequent adjustments in online mode.
office.head: The system displays and allows you to control the following parameters

list.text1: Instantaneous fuel consumption, temperature, fuel density of main engines diesel generators, and boiler
list.text2: Main parameters of the shaft (power, RPM, load)
list.text4: Speed and position of the vessel on the map at the time
list.text6: Strength and direction of the wind relative to the vessel
list.text7: Control of the bunkering process with subsequent report execution
list.text9: Fuel consumption by consumers over a certain period of time (history) and more

afterSendEmail.text: Thank you for contacting us! Our specialists will get in touch with you shortly.
